text.div:
BC NottinghamNullVS ValueSet

Data absent reasons (null values) for Nottingham Combined Grade scores. Removes non-applicable values from the ExceptionValueVS, and adds values that align with LOINC normative answer list LL4561-8

name: NottinghamNullVS
title: BC NottinghamNullVS ValueSet
publisher: The HL7 Cancer Interoperability Group sponsored by Clinical Interoperability Council Work Group (CIC)
description: Data absent reasons (null values) for Nottingham Combined Grade scores. Removes non-applicable values from the ExceptionValueVS, and adds values that align with LOINC normative answer list LL4561-8

concept.display: No residual invasive carcinoma after presurgical (neoadjuvant) therapy
